item.description:
STILL ACCEPTING TICKETS FOR SHOW AND DINNER!

If you end up paying at the door, be sure to tell them you are with Jacki's Meetup Group.

Come for the dinner and show or just the show. 

Enjoy a fun night out with other Fun Stuff Meetup Members while being entertained by Mentalist, Jon Stetson.  His charismatic and lively demonstrations provide a rare opportunity to experience the fascinating phenomenon of an intuitive experience.

Internationally known mentalist Jon Stetson delivers a unique brand of psychic entertainment with his distinctive style of humor, intensity, and compassion. Audience members will live, love, laugh, and learn!

$59 for dinner and the show and best seating doors open 5:30 pm

$25 for show only - doors open at 6:30 pm (change amount in payment box when you RSVP)

When you check-in at the registration desk, tell them you are with Jacki's Fun Stuff Meetup Group and they will direct you to our tables.

Showtime at 7:00 pm

Dinner Show includes Italian Buffet: Freshly Baked Garlic Bread Sticks Caesar Salad with Hand Torn Romaine House made Croutons, Shaved Parmesan and Red Pepper Caesar Dressing Penne Primavera Chicken Picatta Grilled Salmon Fillets with a Putenesca Relish of Fresh Tomato, Calamata Olives, Capers and Onion Family Style Dessert Platters for Each Table of Italian Cookies & Mini Pasteries Coffee, Decaf and Tazo Teas
item.name: Mentalist Show
